databases.sql: CREATE DATABASE goodxtest WITH OWNER = postgres

tables.name: user
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.user ( id serial PRIMARY KEY, username text NOT NULL, user_groups int[], password text NOT NULL, name text, login_count integer, disabled boolean default false);
defaults: INSERT INTO global.user (username, user_groups, password) values ('admin', '{1}'::int[], 'admin')

tables.name: session
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.session (session_id text NOT NULL, date_created timestamp default current_timestamp, username text NOT NULL, user_id text NOT NULL, constraint session_pkey primary key (session_id, username, user_id));

tables.name: user_group
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.user_group ( id serial NOT NULL, group_name text NOT NULL, description text, constraint user_group_pkey primary key (id, group_name))
defaults: INSERT INTO global.user_group (group_name, description) values ('superuser', 'Super User')

tables.name: test_cases
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.test_cases ( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name text UNIQUE NOT NULL, description text, actions text NOT NULL)

tables.name: test_suites
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.test_suites ( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name text UNIQUE NOT NULL, description text, tests text NOT NULL )

tables.name: images
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.images ( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name text UNIQUE NOT NULL, image text NOT NULL)
